name: obsidian-ideatr
description: Fast idea capture with intelligent classification for Obsidian

scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ && ([ -d binaries ] && cp -r binaries ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ || true) && ([ -d tutorials ] && cp -r tutorials ~/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/ideatr/ || true)
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Patrick A Regan <ideatr@paraphlabs.com>
